info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:08PM EDT until June 26 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GOOCHLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRICO AND SOUTHWESTERN HANOVER COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 807 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Randolph Macon College to near Glen Allen to near Bon Air, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Ashland, Randolph Macon College, Glen Allen and Lakeside around 815 PM EDT. Downtown Richmond and Mechanicsville around 820 PM EDT. Richmond, Virginia Commonwealth University, Virginia Union University and Hanover around 825 PM EDT. East Highland Park around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Crozier, Hanover Airport, Vontay, Johnsons Springs, Goodall, Elmont, Short Pump, Longdale, Rockville and Gilman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
